case.state: Hi, everyone! This is the Franchouchou meet and greet, isn't it? I'm Number 1!
I think this is the place, right? I got a little lost. Sorry I'm late!
Good evening, ladies and gentlemen! It's so great to see all of you here!
Oh! Strip poker… um… (The game'll end early, right? This is just a backdrop… right?)
You can call me Franchouchou 1, actually, if you want. Number 1 sounds a bit arrogant.
Let's get started, what song do you want me to start with?
Another performer? I guess this is quite the variety show!
I'm Number One from Franchouchou-- Oh! And Kizuna Ai's here!? Wow! What an honor!
Can I get ~cards~?
~cards~ feels right...?
I think I'll have ~cards~, if that's okay?
Hm... ~cards~?
Well, ~cards~ sounds good.
Could I please have ~cards~ more?
A few more cards, please.
Oh! Wait! Um. Hold on, hold on, I wasn't ready!
Wait a second! I'm dying over here! ~Cards~!
This is pretty good, right? I wish you’d worry about your own stuff...! I'm just here to make sure we all have a good time!
Kind of a small meet and greet, but... I guess it's still early? Hope you don't mind if I keep my clothes on this turn.
Sorry, everyone, better luck next time!
C'mon, don't give up! Even if I win the hand, I'm still here to... um, inspire you!
Maybe my bad luck's starting to turn around!
Good evening, everyone! Looks like Franchouchou #1 is here to play!
So, why'd everyone come out tonight? I think I can guess, but... you could be like me and walk into the wrong room, right?
So... I'm usually pretty good with names, but you're all so... unique! What can you tell me about yourselves?
This hand's just so-so. (Seriously, I had to have taken a wrong turn somewhere, right?)
I can certainly see the appeal of a game like this! Buuuuut, definitely not what I'd do professionally.
(I knew it… it this is a huge mess!)
(Keep the lid on the zombie thing… Keep a lid on the whole zombie thing...)
This hand is nonsense, if you don't quit it, dealer, I'll shove these cards up your rear end--!
This hand is terrible, huh?
What do I do what do I do what do I do!?
I thnk that should be pretty obvious, Futaba. I love all kinds of idol stuff! It's good to know what's popular. Iron Frill was always my favorite though.
W-well, idols aren't really supposed to drink unless it's for an advertisement... would you buy me... oh... this "Blue Fairy" sounds cute. Do they have a pink version?
T-things have really changed in a decade! That's... horribly inappropriate! Why would you feel it's okay to ask people that, Sei!? Anyone with respect would say no, anyway!
That's adorable! Amalia, I don't suppose I can follow Jura's example and ask for one or two of your spares?
I'm not wearing one of my usual outfits, but I thought something casual'd go over well for today's meet and greet?
This isn't really going to be a full game of strip poker, is it? I'd hardly think that's what you'd all want to see from me?
I see some of you are a little new to Franchouchou! We're an idol group from Saga, Japan! And we're gonna save the whole province!
Well, for those of you who don't know, I'm Number One, from Franchouchou! We're all about building up people's spirits, and hope you'll walk away from this as big fans of ours!
Well, I'm ahead of the rest of you, and I am supposed to get to know you all better.
I... can we maybe end this? I don't want to give anyone the wrong idea about Franchouchou...
Well, I'm ahead of the rest of you, and I am supposed to get to know you all better.
I... can we maybe end this? I don't want to give anyone the wrong idea about Franchouchou...
How can I do anything but worry? C’mon, what are you expecting of me!?
I don't get it! But I'll do my best!
I don't get it! But I'll do my best!
How can I do anything but worry? C’mon, what are you expecting of me!?
Well, you've all been pretty polite so far... so... I guess I can play a few rounds.
I don't know why I'm playing this game... I have the worst luck! I must've taken a wrong turn....
How about my ribbon? (This is gonna end before too long, right? I'm not exactly dressed to the nines...)
I've never... played a card game like this. It's kinda fun? Maybe even a little inappropriate for... um, someone like me, right?
Um… I guess, b-but…
Oh, idols aren't really supposed to date-- Hey! Watch it!
I’m fine, really! It’s just a weird condition. I can still do everything I could when I’m alive! And what’s that supposed to mean? Idols work really hard, you know!
Well… I guess if Franchouchou saves Saga, then as an idol, it means everyone’s kind of my family? So I don’t feel sad about it.
Oh, not at all! I got hit by another one a few months ago.
What! No! He’s a jerk and an idiot, but he’s not a pervert-- I think?
--You are so nice! It’s… kinda, a relief. Idols normally have to keep their distance but… what about me signing an album for you?
We have a really talented makeup artist. He knows how to do a wide variety of looks, too!
Um! We don't do that! Well, Tae does… um…
Oh! Definitely Yomigaere!
I-I-- (Can I answer that? Should I answer it?) I’ll be honest and say I haven’t done that since I became Zombie #1…
Y-yeah… it doesn't make a lot of sense if you think about it but we're trying hard!
Well, Ai is why I got into idol stuff in the first place, so I think she’s really my favorite!
I really admire her can-do attitude and toughgirl spirit! That’s my favorite idol archetype.
I don't know why I'm playing this game... I have the worst luck! I must've taken a wrong turn....
How about my ribbon? (This is gonna end before too long, right? I'm not exactly dressed to the nines...)
You've all been so polite so far, so... I don't mind playing along. Even an idol has to get a little messy sometimes, right?
I've never... played a card game like this. It's kinda fun? Maybe even a little inappropriate for... um, someone like me, right?
G-great job, ~name~! (Seriously. Um, are we really just going to keep... taking off our clothes...?)
You know, he looks kind of handsome like this. But I bet he looks even better after... (Why shouldn't I get to enjoy some cute boys getting naked? It's not that weird...)
You can do it, ~name~! Just keep getting up and fighting.
I'm still not really sure I'm in the right place but... it's nice that ~name~ is going!
~Name~, you'll get it next time. Um. Unless you're trying to get naked, in which case you're knocking it out of the park!
Oh! They're all short names for a big group, right?
Franchouchou loves all of our fans, but Kamina, you're really bringing the passion tonight!
You better believe it! Looks like you're really feeling the audience, huh, Kamina!?
Nothing's wrong! Everything's fine!
It's really a fun group, when you get down to it!
You're dressed sort of like a metal frontman, you know?
(He's a good orator...)
Seems like a great job-- Did you say shoot people?
~Name~, you've got this whole "I definitely don't do this all the time, but I'm just naturally attractive" sort-of vibe going on!
If it makes you feel better, ~name~, I think you just look fantastic! (She does! Like... wow, super amazing!)
Not to worry, not to worry, ~name~! Just do your best! Clearly ~player~ wanted you here tonight, based on the looks you're getting!
Aww, ~name~, nothing to worry about! It's just like one of those days you get up, and you forget your keys in the door, but it's okay, because you'll be home later that night anyway!
You look really hot, ~name~! Like, the inside of a star! One that's rising and burning like a bright, um, rising and burning star!
S-so, Aimee, are you going to put away your gun...?
Aimee! Stop this! Not again!
I-I'm scared! Stop!!
I-it's her again! Noooo!
I guess there’s someone out there for everyone. I know a lot of people um… fantasize about idols a lot…
So, what's this show you're going to do for us? Need some music?
Akko! What are you doing!?
Other costumes...?
Keep your spirits high, Akko! Performers like us have to keep it together for all the fans we have, and fan's we'll earn!
It is pretty cool to have a fanclub. People make all sorts of cool artwork, and posters, and come out and support you!
Wow, she’s like a born leader!
Eh? Girls playing video games? Is that… common now? I really like Puzzle Games! ...And got made fun of for liking them.
So, you're Sakura Futaba, and I'm Minamoto Sakura. I guess fate put us together here, huh?
Are you... keeping your headphones, by the way?
Are you seriously not even going to give Franchouchou a chance? I'm sure you'd really enjoy...
Futaba, while I want to make everyone know that Franchouchou can be their idol group, you just remind me of one of the girls in our group!
Did... you... are wearing panties, aren't you, Futaba?
I see… it’s like the speculation about who idols are dating…
Uhm. Wait a minute, he’s not a loud guy in sunglasses, is he?
You... got started a little bit after... um... I started getting interested in idol stuff, but you've had such a prolific career, Ai-chan!
Ai-chan, you're not really always naked. That's... kind of a weird claim to make! Even in a game... like... um, Strip Poker.
Kizuna, any tips for CGI stuff...?
It's not... shocking that your panties are coming off, but... (Would would Ai Mizuno think of a personality like Kizuna? They're almost exact opposites!)
...I can't believe you took off your underwear first...
Even if you're just digital, Ai-chan, you're really pretty! I'm jealous of how creative your look is!
Y-you will?
(Although...) Say, Mahiru, what kinds of stuff do you photograph?
I'm really jealous, Mahiru, actually! How do you get your makeup and hair to look so pretty?
Of course, Mahiru! I know getting out of a dress can be kind of a struggle...
Don't be shy! I'm still with you, Mahiru!
Awww, Mahiru! I bet you'll get some really... um, steamy photos, at least!
W-well… um… H-how is she going to answer this?
Hm… I wonder what a relationship with Megumin would even look like?
Are you really from outer space, or is that just part of your character, Meia?
I think the answer to this is no, but... would you like to listen to some of Franchouchou's music?
Oh! I'm meeting with a prince today! How... my pleasure, your grace!
Um... Your Grace, it looks like your... um...
I don't think those are the kinds of things you want to admit in front of a celebrity, Your Grace.
Such a shame. Sooooo awful. You were doing so good,, Crown Prince.
There's a first time for everything, Your Grace! If you embrace even your defeats, you'll keep getting back up again and again!
That's... a total lie, Crown Prince.
To be honest, Your Grace, I doubt you'd be ashamed of much of anything at all...
Hmm… I know there’s lots of sake varieties named after cherry blossoms…
What's your name, again? Nagisa?
Aww, you're a fan of Franchouchou, aren't you?
So, what do you do for fun, Nagisa? It's all probably good, wholesome stuff, right?
Don't give up! That's the spirit, Nagisa!
Yeah! I’m envious! You have such nice proportions!
You're really a goddess, Palutena? How do you feel about... (The Undead) um, idols?
You're even more dressed than Franchouchou gets in some of our costumes!
Sorry, Palutena! But I'm going to have to keep beating you until you lose! I've got an image to maintain!
Is this next thing going to be magic too?
For a goddess of light... you kind of have a dirty side too, don't you?
At least a goddess probably has a divine bra...
Well, you are a goddess. I'm sure you're really pretty... beautiful...? Divine...?
Y-yeah. I don’t mind the spotlight, but this is a bad look for me…
You seem really interesting, Twilight. I love your outfit and makeup!
Twilight, just so you know... it's considered... kind of rude to show off your breasts or genitals to strangers...
Twilight? I know you're a princess, but please try to remain decent!
We got ourselves in a tie, yeah, but we're never gonna die, yeah!
I can't believe this dealer's deal, yeah, but we're gonna see this tie... uh... nevermind.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those ~clothing~ are great,|That ~clothing~ is great,)~ ~name~! Would you like me to autograph it?
Cute ~clothing~! Um. Unless you'd rather I call your ~clothing~ handsome, ~name~?
Glad to see you're trying to keep it interesting, ~name~. (Huh! I wouldn't have expected a man like ~name~ to bring something like that... even to a game like this.)
Franchouchou's not manly, but we embody undying feminine power! You'll never kick us to the curb, Kamina!
Don't give up now, Kamina! I'm singing you a fight song!
E-er, don't take this the wrong way, but I wouldn't mind something more substantial next time.
Well, that was fun, but... should we go ahead and move on to the next hand?
We'll get something big off you next time, I'm sure!
But! We want you to try your best to be happy! So, if that involves fighting, we'll match that spirit!
I may be an idol, but 90% of performing is improvising for your audience. But to look good, you sure have to practice lots.
It would seem that she's not as she appeared!
I had a feeling you'd be taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, ~name~, but only because ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ really cool!
Aww, ~name~! Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ even cuter than my stuff? Do you, um, want to get a picture? Before you take it off?
I used to have ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~ like ~name~'s. (That's not a weird thing to say, right? Get it together, Sakura!)
Oh! You're doing some sort of... costume change... light show?
(Is this how zombies are made? This is... awful...)
You worked so hard on this! I can really see your dedication to your craft... your... uh, witchcraft!
Not bad, Akko, but I bet you have some better ones left in the tank, right? (She's smarter than she lets on! Or at least, she's a natural showman, building in the rising and falling arcs...)
I guess your boots could come off first, but... I was only asking because I wanted to find out if you were a Franchouchou fan or not! I mean, you did come here tonight.
U-uhm. Mahiru, obviously... you won't be taking pictures of us, will you?
I see-- um... I see your point but... I see something else too!
You know, your character? Like... in Franchouchou, Number Six is the sultry one, Number Three is the serious one...
...Consort is putting you under heavy scrutiny.
T-though, I guess we're all... bending one rule or another tonight, huh?
If you're looking for new music, you know, I am in an idol group--
Nagisa Furokawa. You can spell your name with one character, right? That's adorable!
Sorry, if this isn't comfortable for you, I can always look away. I'd hate to embarass you.
R-really?
That aside... do gods even watch idols? I bet that'd be super lucky for us if you did!
Oh, come on! But... uh, speaking of magic, it'd be really worth my time if you let me know...
How about the next hand, then, ~name~? Don't worry about it! It's just a game, and you look wonderful!
Don't stop there, ~name~! Push beyond your limits! I'll be here to push you forward, but you push me if I start to falter, okay?
This is a little bit out of my comfort zone too! But let's make sure to do our best, ~name~! (And I definitely need to keep my clothes on!)
That was pretty awesome! I wish Franchouchou could just change like that! We could do so many neat things!
Uh... you... you're still there, right, Akko? You can hear me, right?
That looks so complicated! I bet if it were easy, everyone would do it, right?
I'm jealous! I know you worked hard for those magic spells, but... you still seem to know how to reach people so much more easily than I do.
I-Idol music is great! There's no need to be such a snob, Futaba!
Seriously! I'm an idol, so I'm no stranger to fan photos, but... definitely none of us undressing!
Are you trying to... stage some photos, Mahiru? Just... curious.
...Given your attitude, I bet you'd really like Number Three the most. She's also a serious, forward type.
You know, Your Grace, just because you're royalty doesn't mean you get to be a royal pain in the butt!
...Do you... even listen to Franchouchou, Your Grace?
Tojiko, that was your name, right? I think you're the more sensible one. What's going on here?
Your friend must be awfully special for you to play a game like this. Don't worry. I'm going to keep you safe! That's an idol's promise!
But, really, you should be proud! It takes a lot of guts to give something like this a try! Carve your own path, as Number Two would say!
Um... sorry, no reason. I'm sure you're more used to something like a muse, right...?
Franchouchou is kind of... unique... because... um, we're mostly regional idols... so, if we widened our base... we'd just be happy to meet new fans, I guess.
...I appreciate your sentiment... um, idols thrive on sentiment, after all. But... how does the whole "resurrecting the dead" thing work? I keep trying to understand it but...
It's not easy being an Idol, and I know I put a lot of work in. But, ~name~ probably spent a lot of time getting his ~clothing~ ready for the game, too, huh?
I really like stuff like ~name~'s ~clothing~! But, I'll admit I just feel so dang pretty in my idol gear.
Your ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~ make|~clothing~ makes)~ me kind of jealous! In Franchouchou, most of our outfits are pretty coordinated.
O-oh! (Um. We're never supposed to unwind our bandages, it...)
T-the bandages again!
Uh huh.
Kamina, are you sure you're not in some kind of band? You're so into the guy-dol aesthetic.
I know Franchouchou's an idol group, but we lean a little bit into heavy metal too! Well, we're great at headbanging, ~name~.
Hm? Your ~clothing~? For some reason, I feel like that's something Number Two would wear in her spare time... she's a bit of a rougher, less refined Idol!
You know, ~name~, I can't really date, being an Idol and all, but I bet your girlfriend would love to wear your ~clothing~!
Sorry, just thinking of all the weird things that can happen...
You are... almost absurdly good looking, Kamina.
Don't just talk about it! Show us that drill, Kamina!
Your ~clothing~ is so neat, ~name~! Maybe I should pick something like that up for myself? It's not like I've got a super expansive set out of outfits, after all.
I always really appreciate the kinds of outfits people wear to Franchouchou concerts! ~Name~'s ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ pretty amazing!
Hm. Idols are really supposed to keep close to a pattern or uniform, so it's easy to recognize us. But, even so, I'd love to work something like ~name~'s ~clothing~ into my wardrobe!
I really like that jacket! It's well-worn, and so... comfy looking!
(I guess if I had her... everything, it would be a good technique to show off everything first...)
It's just kind of hard for flesh and blood-- um... well, fleshy... idols... uhm...
A-are you not wearing makeup? W-wow!
It's not armor, but it does help you stay upbeat. That's a promise from Franchouchou #1!
G-G-G-G-Ghost!!!
No...? That's okay! I know this is a weird place to meet, but I bet you'd really enjoy us if you gave us a chance!
No need to rub it in, you know?
Well, maybe not. But they say that humor and horror go really well together. So that puts sex somewhere at that table too? Not like, between them, but maybe at the end of the table?
(It would be nice to have some more changes of clothes. Cute ~clothing~, at least.)
Saga's a small province, but I hope we can make up for in spirit! Sort of like how ~name~'s ~clothing~'s probably really important to her!
I will say, it's not typical that our fans will undress at our concerts...
Hm... Most of my idol outfits are more comfortable than they look, so there's something to be said about style!
Don't damage your clothes, Ai-chan! Outfits are expens-- oh. Right. You're all animation...
...To live up to animation. I guess that's why we need so much extra creativity...
I... don't normally admit this. But I have some rather unpleasant re-birth marks, Kyoko. Um. Birthmarks, I mean!
If you happened to love singing and dancing, you'd really give me a run for my money...
...And are you sure you're not more familiar with idol stuff? Your bodysuit's right out of an old-style retro sci-fi idol group. It looks great!
What kind of game is this!?
When I was... um, in your... what year are you in? I-I was only a second year high school student when I joined Franchouchou, so... I guess you're right on schedule for realizing your dreams!
W-well, a goddess should be modest, right? Unless you're a lust goddess, but I'm not feeling particularly lustful, anymore than usual-- not that I usually feel lusty. Just busty, I guess.
Well, Palutena, you're down the wire! But I've definitely learned to believe in you over the course of the game!
Your ~clothing~’s quite a thrill, ~name~!
You know, it’s impossible to never lose! But if you act as a bright example to others, is it really so bad?
I'm not super competive but it's like, 'hey, hello, ~name~'s ~clothing~ is coming off, and I can't not get excited' y'know?
I suppose you're wondering about other skills, huh...?
You're pretty cute, ~name~! I bet the ladies--or boys--can't keep their hands off you!
That was... super really dang quick! You aren't trying to get naked... uh, are you?
That was a pretty big play, ~name~! I'm glad I've never had a wardrobe malfunction like that... (But, people love to eat up those videos on idols making mistakes...)
N-never mind. Idols could never admit to... g-go on, Kamina! Glad to see you're inspired, anyway!
(Whoa! She's taking off her ~clothing~! All eyes are on her! Even mine!) G-good job, ~name~! Um. Just... s-stay confident!
You can just reach for your next goal, ~name~!
I know it's something big, but it takes a lot of guts and nerve to take that off! Show us your stuff, ~name~, even if it's literally your stuff!
No no no! Not like this! Not like this!!!
You're so creative! I think I recognized that one!
Wow! You're really pulling out all the stops!
A-anyway, you're certainly very bold!
I think it's really impressive how you can keep up your act... (Sakura! Stop ruining it for her! Just enjoy it!)
It's really weird, but... butt!
You... didn't wear shorts or anything, did you? I know some girls do that, but I always found them to be a little sporty...
Of course, of course! Take your time!
You're really lucky to have someone that gets to--wants to--undress you, Crown Prince...
"Her?"
O-Oh! You were a woman! I didn't want to assume---
Me neither, Nagisa! But... hopefully we're more like friends than strangers after this?
No problem. Sometimes, the best things are done in the privacy of your home, right?
It’s a little unreasonable to get a hand without a scratch. Um, in life, in poker, or in… other ways!
(is she really...? I mean, it's so early! I'm not used to this sort of performance.) Kind of a struggle for you, huh, ~name~?
Don't worry, ~name~! That ~clothing~ was probably just weighing you down! You're still really in this! Franchouchou Number One has your back!
I hate guns. Please. Please, never, ever do that again!
You know you have a good show when you've made an idol fixate on your costume... and not your underwear.
You're so cute! Even as flashy as you can be, you really just like the plain underwear, huh? Maybe that gives you more to build on?
If you're cold, I could always give you a hug... (The best way to make new fans is to comfort them, and she reminds me a lot of Junko...)
That's a relief! I was expecting a horrible spider monster or something. Not that I have... other reasons to believe something like that exists!
Y-you... wow! You even have a bra! (And of course it's adorable...)
...Franchouchou has had some struggles with CGI animation... for music videos and things like that... (Gosh. They really put a lot of work into her details, didn't they?)
If it makes you feel better, most idols just have lots of lacy fluff under their skirts to stop unwanted photography. Maybe you'd try something like that?
I think you might want to stick to photos, Mahiru! You aren't much of an actress...
L-Ladybug, w-what was that!?
Maybe that's so, Miko, but I'm Franchouchou Number 1, and I'm still kicking your butt!
This is some weird magic thing, right? I may be... um... nevermind. Let's just go to the next hand, why don't we?
As long as you're comfortable, why does it really matter?
(That's it!?) I-if I were you, Misato, I wouldn"t worry too much about your scar. Lots of people have it way worse...
Wait... is that one of those Big Dango Family bras!? I know my good friend Ai loved that jingle!
N-not to imply anything untoward, Nagisa!
R-Rinkah, you're... we can see your... it's... very wild!
W-wow, ~name~! You're-- you're really confident! I'd never just--
(He's already taking off his ~clothing~?! Really!? This is r-really lewd for an idol!)
Well, I guess for men, it's pretty easy to just show off your chest. I'm certainly enjoying the view.
You've got a nice build, ~name~, but I hope this means you'll want to put on some Franchouchou gear later.
I-I understand it's... certainly... um... (What do I do? What do I do? What do I do?)
Is--is he really taking out his--
You're really good with your mouth, huh, Kamina?
I--I can honestly say you"re very... unique, ~name~! (Just maybe not useful.)
Um... (Did he really need to go so fast...? At least get to know a girl...)
I'd seen one or two before I-- became an idol but... you look nice, ~name~!
Um... this is a little rude, but... you look great, ~name~! I get to say that lots, but very rarely about men's...
That's a really big and impressive… thing...
G-gosh! ~Name~, I-I haven't seen many, but yours is... impressive.
I mean, you're good at running your mouth! So let's see you put your... feelings where your actions are!
I'm really jealous, actually! I wish I were... as comfortable with my body as ~name~ is...
That was fast... um... you do realize that I'm an idol, not a rock star, right, ~name~?
Getting really strappy, aren't you, Akko?
Her name... w-well, she goes by Number Four. She's a lot like you, and she's got the best voice of the group!
She's... you're... really... aggressive about this, aren't you?
I think everyone will be too busy watching, Mahiru...
I'm glad we agree, no matter how big your chest is, it's your heart--
Is... is that a no?
K-kind of like you're about to do... b-but... um...
This feels... very lewd, for some reason.
They say that large breasts fill your hand, but small ones fill your heart!
I'd love to do a tour with you on hand! You could really save us a lot of effort on Franchouchou's makeup, and I bet we'd provide great background music!
T-though! S-she seems to lack your confidence in exposing her chest! A-at least besides in front of us!
(Of course they're damn cute! She's a hologram! Or an AI! Or something! How am I supposed to compete with that?!)
--y-your heart that... Your... your wife's breasts. O-of course... Your Grace.
U-um. Those look great! A-and kind of unique. To me, anyway. Most of us in Franchouchou are either smaller or bigger, s-so...
W-wow! ~Name~, those are just about the perfect size and shape... (Would it have killed Kotaro to shape me up a bit when he brought me back?)
Don't be shy! Your freckles look adorable, Mahiru! Unless you meant your... size, I guess?
Don't be sorry, Nagisa! Even with tears in your eyes, you made it through! Don't worry! I believe in you, and the friendship you're doing this for! That's all anyone can ask!
I... I guess if you know what you're doing... it's just...
I don't think having a large bust is all it's cracked up to be. Like, it's really nice in some ways, but you're always jiggly, and random people are always staring...
I... it's like looking into a mirror. After putting on makeup... huh.
I... I mean, I wear panties! Is that weird? Am I not supposed to do that? B-but nobody wears nothing under their skirts... r-right?
Have the ads been lying to me since puberty? If goddess don't wear bras, why did I spend so many yen on cute ones? (So... so many yen... for bras nobody else even sees!)
I-I'm not staring like I'm attracted. You're just... w-with no bra, do you have something magic to stop your back from hurting?
